entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 16 April 2023
